--- title: LS 빅데이터 스쿨 homework2 --- ## 데이터분석_HW2 # 144P ## Q1.배기량 4이하 / 5이상 자동차의 hwy 평균 비교 ::: {#59ceca8a .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd mpg = pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv") mpg mpg_a = mpg.query("displ<=4") mpg_b = mpg.query("displ>=5") ``` ::: ## a평균치 ::: {#b22309c8 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_a["hwy"].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` np.float64(25.96319018404908) ``` ::: ::: ## b평균치 ::: {#22753c92 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_b["hwy"].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ``` np.float64(18.07894736842105) ``` ::: ::: ## Q2.제조회사에 따른 도시 연비(cty) 차이 ::: {#128e2e36 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg mpg_audi = mpg.query("manufacturer == 'audi'") mpg_toyota = mpg.query("manufacturer == 'toyota'") ``` ::: ## audi 연비 ::: {#0397aaa7 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_audi["cty"].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ``` np.float64(17.61111111111111) ``` ::: ::: ## toyota 연비 ::: {#1c835bcf .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_toyota["cty"].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6} ``` np.float64(18.529411764705884) ``` ::: ::: ## "chevrolet' 'ford' 'honda' 자동차의 고속도로 연비 평균 ::: {#1d48ea00 .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg mpg.query("manufacturer in ['chevrolet','ford','honda']") mpg_mean = mpg.query("manufacturer in ['chevrolet','ford','honda']") mpg_mean["hwy"].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7} ``` np.float64(22.50943396226415) ``` ::: ::: # 153p ## Q1.audi자동차중 hwy가 1~5위에 해당하는 자동차의 데이터 출력 ::: {#73fbfe84 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg mpg_audi = mpg.query("manufacturer == 'audi'") mpg_audi.sort_values("hwy", ascending = False).head() mpg.query("manufacturer == 'audi'")\ .sort_values("hwy", ascending = False)\ .head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category
2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p compact
3 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 auto(av) f 21 30 p compact
1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact
0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact
9 audi a4 quattro 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) 4 20 28 p compact
``` ::: ::: # 158p ## Q1.mpg 데이터 복사본과 cty+hwy 합산 연비 변수 ::: {#1a6846d0 .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np mpg = pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv") mpg mpg_new = mpg.copy() mpg_new mpg_new.assign(total = mpg_new["cty"] + mpg_new["hwy"]) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category total
0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact 47
1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact 50
2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p compact 51

4 audi a4 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p compact 42
... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ...

234 rows × 12 columns

``` ::: ::: ## Q2.평균 연비 변수 ( 합산 연비 변수 /2 ) ::: {#8d0da757 .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_new=mpg_new.assign( total = mpg_new["cty"] + mpg_new["hwy"], mean = (mpg_new["cty"] + mpg_new["hwy"]) / 2 ) mpg_new.assign( total = mpg_new["cty"] + mpg_new["hwy"], mean = lambda x : x["total"] / 2 ) mpg_new mpg_new.assign( total = lambda x: x["cty"] + x["hwy"], mean = lambda x : x["total"] / 2 ) mpg_new ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=10} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## Q3.평균 연비 변수가 가장 높은 자동차 3종 ::: {#8469e972 .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_new.sort_values("mean", ascending = False).head(3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=11} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category total mean
221 volkswagen new beetle 1.9 1999 4 manual(m5) f 35 44 d subcompact 79 39.5
212 volkswagen jetta 1.9 1999 4 manual(m5) f 33 44 d compact 77 38.5

``` ::: ::: ## Q4. 1~3번 문제를 해결할 수 있는 연결된 pandas 구문, 단, mpg 원본 사용 ::: {#66dca447 .cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np mpg = pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv") mpg mpg.assign(total = lambda x: x["cty"] + x["hwy"], mean = lambda x : x["total"] / 2)\ .sort_values("mean", ascending = False) \ .head(3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=12} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category total mean
221 volkswagen new beetle 1.9 1999 4 manual(m5) f 35 44 d subcompact 79 39.5
212 volkswagen jetta 1.9 1999 4 manual(m5) f 33 44 d compact 77 38.5
222 volkswagen new beetle 1.9 1999 4 auto(l4) f 29 41 d subcompact 70 35.0
``` ::: :::
